description: Play it cool and kick back with a refreshing nectarine granita topped with peaches and cream. This easy dessert recipe uses just five ingredients.
keywords: Granita,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Nov 2021,Sesame free,Summer,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Low fat,Peach,Peanut free
name: Nectarine Granita With Peaches & Cream Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 ripe yellow nectarines, halved, destoned, roughly chopped
1 ripe yellow peach, halved, destoned, cut into wedges (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Place nectarines, lemon juice, sugar and 1/2 cup water in a food processor and process for 1 minute or until smooth and combined.
Pour mixture into a 26 x 37cm (3cm deep) metal tray. Freeze, uncovered, for 2 hours or until just starting to freeze.
Using a fork, scrape frozen mixture into centre. Freeze for 1 hour. Repeat process twice or until all of granita has been scraped and coarse ice crystals have formed.
To serve, divide granita among serving glasses, and top with cream and peach wedges.
